eu.smartcampus.api

Enum DeviceConnectivityAPI.ConfirmationLevel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<DeviceConnectivityAPI.ConfirmationLevel>
      • eu.smartcampus.api.DeviceConnectivityAPI.ConfirmationLevel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<DeviceConnectivityAPI.ConfirmationLevel>
    Enclosing interface:
    DeviceConnectivityAPI

    public static enum DeviceConnectivityAPI.ConfirmationLevel
extends java.lang.Enum<DeviceConnectivityAPI.ConfirmationLevel>
    Type of write confirmation.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      DEVICE_ACTION_TAKEN
      The device has confirmed to take action upon the write request.
      DEVICE_CONFIRMED
      The device confirmed the write operation.
      GATEWAY_CONFIRMED
      The write operation was sent to the gateway and confirmed.
      UNCONFIRMED
      Write operation sent to the gateway but confirmation so far.

    • Method Summary

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • UNCONFIRMED

        public static final DeviceConnectivityAPI.ConfirmationLevel UNCONFIRMED
        Write operation sent to the gateway but confirmation so far. This is the level to be used when there no confirmation is possible.

      • GATEWAY_CONFIRMED

        public static final DeviceConnectivityAPI.ConfirmationLevel GATEWAY_CONFIRMED
        The write operation was sent to the gateway and confirmed. An acknowledge in this level means that the message has arrived at the gateway.

      • DEVICE_CONFIRMED

        public static final DeviceConnectivityAPI.ConfirmationLevel DEVICE_CONFIRMED
        The device confirmed the write operation.

      • DEVICE_ACTION_TAKEN

        public static final DeviceConnectivityAPI.ConfirmationLevel DEVICE_ACTION_TAKEN
        The device has confirmed to take action upon the write request.
